items.title: Smart EU üá™üá∫ Grant Matching Platform

Implemented the full functionality cycle from user authentication to complex dashboards with dynamic data visualization. Introduced a professional stack of tools for state management, error monitoring, and continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD).
key-points: Developed and implemented all frontend components of the Single-Page Application (SPA), including complex authentication mechanics, search with preview, and interactive charts.
Designed and implemented the application‚Äôs global state management architecture using NgRx, ensuring predictable data flow and performance at all stages of the user workflow.
Integrated Sentry for full-scale error monitoring in the production environment, enabling proactive detection and fixing of critical issues before they impacted end users.
Configured and maintained a fully automated CI/CD pipeline using Jenkins, enabling automated testing, building, and deployment of the application with every codebase update.
items.full-description: As the sole frontend developer in the Aisema project, I created a comprehensive web application that helps small and medium-sized enterprises find suitable EU grants with the help of artificial intelligence. The project was implemented in collaboration with ≈Åukasiewicz Research Network ‚Äî ITECH. Responsibilities included the full development cycle: from architecture design and business logic implementation to DevOps process setup and post-release support.

sections.title: Application Architecture and Development
sections.content: Designed and implemented a modular and scalable Angular architecture using custom services for interaction with REST APIs. Implemented secure access mechanisms (Guards) and error handling (Interceptors) at the HTTP request level. Used the SASS preprocessor for styling, creating a maintainable and flexible style system.

sections.title: State Management and Performance
sections.content: Applied the NgRx library (Redux pattern for Angular) for centralized and predictable management of the application‚Äôs complex state. Extensively used RxJS and Observables for reactive programming, efficient handling of asynchronous operations and events, which is critical for a responsive interface with dynamic content.

sections.title: Internationalization and Monitoring
sections.content: Integrated the ngx-translate library for full multilingual support (all official EU languages), which is a key requirement for a product targeting the European market. To ensure reliability, implemented Sentry, enabling real-time tracking, grouping, and rapid response to errors in the production environment.

sections.title: CI/CD Processes and Deployment
sections.content: Configured and automated the continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD) process using Jenkins. The pipeline included stages for running tests, building the production version of the application, and automatic deployment, significantly speeding up and simplifying the release process.

items.title: Order Management System for Factory
items.description: Designed and single-handedly delivered a full-stack Angular & Firebase application that digitalized the core order management process. The system seamlessly connects clients, sales, and internal departments, replacing chaotic manual workflows with a streamlined, automated, and transparent platform. It features real-time collaborative editing, a comprehensive audit trail, and deep integration with a previously deployed configurator.
key-points: Architected and built the entire full-stack application from scratch as a solo developer, overseeing both frontend and backend development to meet precise business needs.
Engineered a sophisticated real-time collaborative editing feature, allowing multiple users to update order details simultaneously with a reliable conflict resolution system.
Implemented a granular Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) system to create highly tailored experiences and secure data access for diverse user roles across the company.
Seamlessly integrated the new order management system with a custom configurator (also built by me), creating a unified end-to-end workflow from product configuration to order placement.
Established and configured a professional CI/CD pipeline with separate staging and production environments for controlled testing and stable, automated releases.
items.full-description: Spearheaded the complete software development lifecycle for a mission-critical order management application that transformed operational efficiency for a mobile home manufacturer. The solution acts as a central hub, automating previously disjointed processes and providing unparalleled visibility across sales, production, and client communication.

sections.title: Full-Stack Architecture & Development
sections.content: Solely developed a robust application using Angular on the frontend, adhering to modern best practices for maintainability and performance. The backend is powered by Firebase, utilizing Firestore as the real-time database, Firebase Auth for secure authentication, Cloud Functions for serverless logic (e.g., email notifications), and Cloud Storage for document management.

sections.title: Real-Time Collaboration & Audit Trail
sections.content: Implemented a Google Sheets-like real-time editing environment, enabling synchronous order updates by multiple users. Designed a comprehensive change history log that tracks every modification, providing full accountability and simplifying issue resolution.

sections.title: Advanced Integration & Access Control
sections.content: Seamlessly integrated the new order system with the existing mobile home configurator, ensuring data consistency from the initial quote to the final order. Built a sophisticated role management system that dynamically customizes the UI and functionality based on user permissions (e.g., clients, sales reps, managers, production staff).

sections.title: Deployment & Environment Strategy
sections.content: Configured and managed isolated development and production environments. This allowed for thorough user acceptance testing (UAT) with the sales team in the dev environment before deploying stable, feature-complete builds to all clients and distributors in production.

items.title: Enterprise Speech Analysis Platform
items.description: Developed a fully functional frontend application for speech data analysis in a corporate environment from scratch. Implemented a complex user and permission management system, a multilingual interface with theme customization, and an intuitive analytics dashboard. Integrated corporate authentication via Microsoft SSO and ensured seamless deployment using Docker.
key-points: Designed and implemented the entire UI/UX of the platform from scratch, creating an intuitive and modern interface based on Material Design v3 principles with fully responsive layouts.
Implemented a comprehensive role-based access control (RBAC) system with a role hierarchy, extended access rights, and detailed user activity logging.
Optimized application performance through effective state management with NgRx, reducers and selectors, and component re-rendering optimization.
Created custom services for working with the REST API, featuring unified error handling, authorization interceptors, request caching, and retry mechanisms.
items.full-description: Independently developed the frontend for a corporate speech analysis platform in collaboration with the Lockus call center. Built a comprehensive solution with a focus on scalability, security, and user experience.

sections.title: Architecture and Development
sections.content: Designed a modular Angular architecture with an emphasis on component reusability. Implemented application state management using NgRx for predictable data handling. Developed custom guards for route protection and resolvers for optimized data loading.

sections.title: Design and Interface
sections.content: Created a complete design system based on Angular Material v3 with custom theming tokens. Implemented responsive interfaces supporting both light and dark themes. Developed a component system adhering to accessibility and usability principles.

sections.title: Security and Authentication
sections.content: Integrated corporate authentication through Microsoft SSO. Implemented a role-based access control (RBAC) system with a hierarchy of rights and privileges. Built an admin panel for managing users and access settings.

sections.title: Analytics and Visualization
sections.content: Developed an interactive dashboard with various types of charts and graphs for visualizing statistics. Implemented advanced data filtering, sorting, and searching capabilities with pagination.

sections.title: Infrastructure and Deployment
sections.content: Configured Docker containerization for deployment across multiple environments (testing, production). Introduced code review processes and ensured multilingual support using ngx-translate.

items.title: Full-Stack Mobile Homes Configurator
items.description: Architected and single-handedly delivered a sophisticated web-based configurator for a mobile home factory, revolutionizing the sales process. The application enables real-time customization, generates instant professional quotes, and integrates with internal systems. Built initially with a custom vanilla engine for maximum performance, it was later modernized with a full Angular frontend and Firebase backend to enhance scalability and maintainability.
key-points: Architected and built the entire full-stack application from scratch as a solo developer, overseeing both frontend and backend development to meet precise business needs.
Designed and implemented a proprietary DOM management and state engine in vanilla JavaScript, achieving framework-like reactivity without external dependencies for optimal performance.
Engineered a multi-step configuration flow with instant model switching and persistent progress saving, allowing clients to seamlessly compare different home configurations in real-time.
Seamlessly integrated the configurator with the factory's sales department by automating the generation of detailed, print-ready specification sheets for immediate use in production planning.
Modernized the technology stack by leading a complete rewrite with Angular and Firebase, implementing Firestore for real-time data, Cloud Functions and a robust authentication system.
items.full-description: Spearheaded the complete development lifecycle of a mission-critical sales configuration platform that transformed customer engagement for a mobile home manufacturer. The solution bridges the gap between client customization and production, providing an immersive digital experience that significantly boosted sales and elevated the company's technological brand.

sections.title: Core Architecture & Development
sections.content: Solely developed the initial application using vanilla JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3, creating a lightweight and highly performant solution without framework overhead. Designed and built a custom state management system and DOM manipulation engine to handle complex, dynamic UI updates efficiently, ensuring a smooth user experience.

sections.title: User Experience & Workflow Automation
sections.content: Implemented an intuitive multi-step configuration process supporting an extensive catalog of options and customizations. Engineered critical features like instant model-to-model comparison with full state preservation and automated generation of professional, detailed PDF quotes that flow directly into the sales pipeline for processing.

sections.title: System Modernization & Integration
sections.content: Led the strategic migration to a modern, scalable tech stack. Rebuilt the frontend with Angular, adopting component-based architecture and TypeScript for superior maintainability. Architected the backend on Firebase, utilizing Firestore for real-time data syncing, Cloud Functions for serverless operations (e.g., email notifications, PDF generation), and Firebase Auth for secure user management.

sections.title: Business Impact & Performance Optimization
sections.content: The application became a pivotal sales tool, directly increasing conversions by empowering clients to visualize and customize their homes transparently. Took ownership of optimizing all application performance aspects, including state handling and DOM operations, to ensure rapid load times and a seamless configuration experience, thereby enhancing the company's market image as an innovative leader.

items.title: Full-Stack Brochure Offer Configurator
items.description: Conceived and developed an internal web application for sales teams and distributors to dynamically generate professional, print-ready brochures for mobile home offers. Initially built with vanilla JavaScript for maximum performance and control, the application is now being modernized with Angular to improve maintainability and feature development, streamlining the entire sales proposal process.
key-points: Architected and developed a dynamic brochure configurator from the ground up to replace manual, time-consuming proposal creation methods.
Engineered a real-time layout engine that dynamically arranges product images, descriptions, and pricing into visually coherent and brand-consistent templates.
Implemented a user-friendly interface allowing sales personnel to quickly configure and generate high-quality, print-ready PDF documents on demand.
Initiated and is leading the modernization effort to refactor the application into Angular, enhancing code structure, scalability, and developer ergonomics.
items.full-description: Designed and built a comprehensive internal web application that automates and standardizes the creation of sales brochures and client proposals. The tool empowers the sales team to produce professional offers quickly, ensuring brand consistency and accuracy.

sections.title: Vanilla JS Architecture & Performance
sections.content: Built the initial application using pure JavaScript, HTML, and CSS to create a fast, lightweight, and reliable tool without external dependencies. Developed custom logic for dynamic content injection, template switching, and real-time preview generation to provide instant feedback to users.

sections.title: Dynamic Template Engine
sections.content: Created a flexible template system that automatically adjusts layouts based on content input (number of images, text length). Implemented client-side PDF generation capabilities to produce print-ready documents instantly, eliminating the need for external design software.

sections.title: Modernization with Angular
sections.content: Leading the ongoing architectural shift to Angular to improve long-term maintainability and feature scalability. The refactor introduces a component-based architecture, TypeScript for type safety, and modern development practices, making the codebase more robust and easier for teams to work with.

sections.title: Business Process Integration
sections.content: The tool was seamlessly integrated into the daily workflow of distributors and the internal sales department, standardizing the offer creation process and drastically reducing the margin for error. This resulted in a more efficient sales pipeline and a professional image in client communications.

items.title: Unified Chatbot Plugin for E‚ÄëCommerce
items.description: Orchestrated a multi-language chatbot for a leading furniture e-commerce platform. Engineered a data pipeline for a contextual vector product search, a vanilla JS widget with service forms, and a scalable demo configurator.
key-points: Built the semantic search engine frontend, processing user queries into vectors and displaying relevant product results in an interactive chat-based slider.
Architected the entire frontend as a lightweight, embeddable script with a Webpack-based build system for seamless integration into any CMS or e-commerce platform.
Containerized the companion demo configurator application with Docker, enabling the generation of white-label chatbot instances with custom data sets and styling.
Simple data parsing scripts to extract, clean, and structure product catalog information (images, descriptions, attributes) from multiple sources for vectorization.
items.full-description: Led the development of a chatbot from the initial data layer to the end-user interface. Responsibilities included creating the data pipeline for the vector search feature, building the client-facing application, and developing a tool for generating custom demo instances.

sections.title: Data Pipeline for Vector DB
sections.content: Designed and implemented the data acquisition and processing pipeline. Wrote custom parsers to aggregate and normalize the product catalog from various sources (CSV, XML, APIs). Prepared and structured this data (titles, descriptions, specs) for generating embeddings, forming the foundation of the contextual vector search feature.

sections.title: Frontend Architecture & Build
sections.content: Constructed the entire chat application using vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS for optimal performance and size. Configured a multi-stage Webpack build to produce a minified, self-contained IIFE script, ensuring hassle-free integration on any client website with a single tag.

sections.title: Contextual Semantic Search Interface
sections.content: Engineered the client-side logic for the vector-based product discovery. The system translates user queries into semantic searches against the pre-built product vector database, returning and displaying highly relevant items in a seamless inline slider, directly within the chat dialogue.

sections.title: Demo Configurator & Deployment
sections.content: Developed a full-stack demo configurator web app that allows generating customized chatbot instances by defining UID, colors, and sample data. The build and deployment process for each demo instance was fully automated and containerized using Docker, ensuring environment consistency and rapid provisioning.
